speedrun-practice.description: A mod that helps you practice speedrunning. See website for more info

checkpoint-randomizer.description: Warp to a random checkpoint on various triggers (cells, flies, orbs, eco, death).

random-cell-order.description: Jak 1 but you must pick up cells in the (random) specified order. Check the website for more info on toggle-able settings.

flutflut-legacy.description: Play the whole game on FlutFlut.

zoomer-legacy.description: Play the whole game on the Zoomer, with various changes to better explore the entire game.

super-mario-64.description: Plays similar to Super Mario 64 (stars->cells, red coins->scout flies, coins->orbs)

bugged.description: Over 25 bugs added to completely change the speedrun! Think you can find them all? Check the website for hints

patched.description: Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy v1.1 ;)

orange-demon.description: Play through the entire game while being chased by Daxter!

spec-ops.description: Immediately after being rescued by Daxter, Jak is fitted with an all black Spec Ops outfit and a new weapon. The Blaster Mod has been replaced with a fully automatic suppressed XM Nova assault rifle that fires depleted light eco rounds. These light eco rounds will easily take down anything in your way.

mortin-time.description: Adds over 18 levels and 900+ collectibles to the game and new powerups and adventures! Note: currently it is disguised as a fart mod. It is not.

jak2-august.description: Mimics the Jak II August 2003 Review build which allows for consite skip

heromode-plus.description: Overhauls Jak II's difficulty, but with a twist! Adds weapon mods, custom modifiers, hero mode changes, and various other things to find! Are you up for the challenge?

roguelike-jak2.description: The Jak Time Loop is broken! To restore it, Jak must fight through random missions that grow more unstable the further you venture. As the enemies get stronger, so can you! With Vin's help, Jak must blast his way back into the metalhead nest, and restore his destiny.

dark-jak-renegade.description: Infinite Dark Jak, plus you can rolljump, use guns, vehicles, jetboard, etc. Hold L2 to use Dark Bomb/Dark Blast, or to undo Dark Giant. Reboot in debug mode to unlock everything at the start.

platformia.description: Contents: Platforms (99.9%), Particles (0.1%). May contain traces of Jak II checkpoints.

forgotten-lands.description: Experience a new story and levels. Start a new game and beat Geyser Rock to access the custom levels.

up.description: Only Up in Jak 1. Hub 1+2 so far. WARNING: the custom levels take up ~700MB, and will take a couple minutes to install.

river-to-water.description: Custom level River to Water (Afon i ddwr) of a winding mountain path with powercells, scoutflies and orbs guarded by lurkers! Visit via the warpgate once you complete the game or just use debug mode to visit early!

rockpool.description: A sunny beach side trip with cliffs to scale, powercells to find and lurkers to fight! Be careful not to swim out too far...  Access via the warpgate in debug or a full save game!

overgrown.description: Custom Forest themed Jak and Daxter Level

glacier.description: The lurkers are harvesting vast quantities of dark eco from these rocky glaciers. You must stop their terrible plans and destroy their pumps! Featuring 101 orbs and 7 power cells to find and discover!

teamruns.description: Online and couch co-op multiplayer mod
